properties.description: Attractive three bedroom semi-detached family home situated within 0.5 miles of Petts Wood station with fast trains to London and within easy walking distance of local shops, schools, bus routes and National Trust woodland. The property comprises; two receptions, fitted 18'9 x 10'1 kitchen/breakfast room and conservatory. The property also benefits from having a utility room and cloakroom. To the first floor there are three bedrooms and a family bathroom with separate WC. Additional features include double glazing, gas central heating and a well presented interior...
properties.location: Petts Wood Road, Petts Wood, Orpington

properties.description:
Presented in excellent decorative order throughout is this two double bedroom, two bathroom, garden flat.
The modern fitted kitchen is open plan to the living room which boasts solid wooden floors and includes integrated appliances including a dishwasher & a washing machine. This large open plan benefits from bi folding doors onto a secluded private courtyard garden. Both bedrooms are double sized, and the family bathroom boasts a matching three piece suite a shower attachment over the bath. There is also a separate wet room. There are walnut doors throughout and wiring for Sky TV/aerial points in the living room/kitchen and both bedrooms.
This apartment being only five years old, is still under a 10 year building guarantee...

We are proud to offer this delightful 4 bedroom, 3 bathroom detached house in a great location.Centrally located being close to York's many Tourist attractions as well as walking distance to The Barbican, York Opera House and easy access to the Theatre Royal and the Racecourse. ...

Moving is a busy and exciting time and we're here to make sure the experience goes as smoothly as possible by giving you all the help you need under one roof. Our record of success has been built upon a single-minded desire to provide our clients, with a top class personal service delivered by highly motivated and trained staff. A sign of this success is the fact that a large proportion of our business is from referrals, satisfied Clients who have recommended us to friends and family.

This two-bedroom student apartment is located within walking distance of the city centre and the university of leeds. Ideal for young professionals. Permit Parking is available, Ideal for students or professionals! The company has always used computer and internet technology, but the company's biggest strength is the genuinely warm, friendly and professional approach that we offer all of our clients.

A well-positioned first floor, one double bedroom apartment located within a convenient location moments from Carnaby Street and only moments from bustling Oxford Circus and Piccadilly Circus.The apartment benefits from a living area with gorgeous dark panelled flooring, a separate kitchen, a double bedroom with an abundance of built in storage space and a bathroom with bathtub and overhead shower.

The apartment is located in an amazing location being a short walk from the wonderful shops, bars and restaurants of Carnaby, Regent and Oxford Street as well as the newly restored Marshall Street baths and gym. It is well connected being in close proximity to Oxford Circus, Piccadilly Circus and Tottenham Court Road underground stations as well as numerous bus routes.The apartment benefits from a living area with gorgeous dark panelled flooring, a separate kitchen, a double bedroom with an abundance of built in storage space and a bathroom with bathtub and overhead shower.
